entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
